hcc_text: Bronx River Avenue is in the middle third in the Bronx for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile.
info: At Bronx River Avenue at Bruckner Exwy Wb Exit 47 and Bruckner Boulevard Wb, there were 3 deaths and severe injuries in crashes between 2008 and 2012.
intersection: Bronx River Avenue at Bruckner Exwy Wb Exit 47 and Bruckner Boulevard Wb
